	Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP, or similar).
	Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
	Strong communication skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.


Salary Range
Open for negotiation.

Job Position: Logistics Assistant

Job Location:&nbsp;Alaba International, Lagos

	As the Logistics Assistant, you will work closely with the Logistics manager to plan, manage and facilitate the overall supply chain needs/requirements of the company including handling deliveries across all locations and branches, liaising with logistics companies/vendors, managing stocks, and other fleet concerns to deliver products on deadlines.

	Tackling and resolving any issues or complaints that may arise.

	Assist in planing and schedulingshipments to ensure timely delivery to customers.

	Resolving delivery inconsistencies or delay.
	Ensuring that shipping documents are well kept, updated, and in compliance. Examples include cost statements/ receipt, stock counts, delivery of products, product delivery and shipment documents,etc.

	Responsible for tracking, receiving, and stocking all items ordered.
	Ensure materials are appropriately stored.
	Working proactively with the cashier in ensuring and realizing efficiencies in inventory management.
	Assist in generatingdaily, weekly and monthly report of all logistics and warehouse activities.
